Package org.aposin.licensescout.license

Class LicenseStoreData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aposin.licensescout.license.LicenseStoreData
  • public class LicenseStoreData
extends Object
    Collection of licenses and mappings of names and URLs to licenses.

    Initialisation:

    1. Create an instance
    2. Call readLicenses(InputStream, Notices, boolean, ILFLog) to read in the licenses from a file
    3. Call readNameMappings(InputStream, ILFLog) and readUrlMappings(InputStream, ILFLog)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LicenseStoreData()
      Constructor.

      • getLicenseDetectionStringMap

        public Set<Map.Entry<String,​List<License>>> getLicenseDetectionStringMap()
        Exposes the internal data structure of the license store.

        Used for automatic detection of licenses by strings in LicenseUtil.detectLicenses(BufferedReader, LicenseStoreData).

        Returns:
        a set of license definitions

                         Notices notices,
                         boolean validateXml,
                         ILFLog log)
                  throws IOException,
                         ParserConfigurationException,
                         SAXException
        Reads known licenses from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        inputStream -
        notices -
        validateXml - true if the license XML file should be validated, false otherwise
        log - the logger

        IOException
        SAXException
        ParserConfigurationException
